heading: Build Standalone Forms with DronaHQ
descriptions: DronaHQ introduces a robust Forms feature that lets you create standalone, customizable forms and record responses directly into your connected SQL databases like MySQL, PostgreSQL, and more. These forms are publicly accessible via a unique URL, making it easy to gather responses.
Key features include:

Effortless Form Creation: Start by navigating to the Create tab, where selecting 'Form' automatically generates a new form in a separate tab.

Database Integration: Direct form responses to your existing SQL database by connecting it as a Connector within DronaHQ.
Custom Field Synchronization: Add custom fields while building your form, and they will be automatically synchronized with your DronaHQ Database upon publishing.
Visual Customization: Enhance your forms with text, images, and dividers, and customize controls with options like hide, required, or swap before publishing.
Post-Submission Actions: Set up additional actions such as sending emails or Slack notifications that trigger upon form submission.
Response Management: Access all form responses in the Responses tab, with the ability to download them as CSV files for further analysis.
Preview, Publish, and Share: Before making your form public, preview it, then publish to receive a unique URL. You can also embed the form on your website.
This update empowers you to create and manage forms efficiently, ensuring seamless data collection and integration. For more details, visit our DronaHQ Forms Documentation.

heading: DronaHQ Dynamic - Dashboards
descriptions: DronaHQ now offers a powerful and user-friendly Dashboard feature, designed to streamline data visualization and business intelligence tasks. With this update, users can create dynamic, customizable dashboards that enable in-depth data exploration, advanced analytics, and collaborative insights.
Key enhancements include:

Home Screen Overview: Quickly access recently edited items, dashboards, charts, datasets, and connectors through an intuitive navigation menu.

Dashboard Management: Create, navigate, and manage your dashboards efficiently, ensuring an organized workspace.
Chart Builder: Visualize your data with ease using a wide range of chart options and low-code design capabilities.
SQL Labs: A dedicated environment for creating, testing, and managing SQL queries, with support for saving and organizing queries.
These improvements empower users to leverage data-driven insights, drive business growth, and maintain a secure, organized data environment.
For more information, visit our DronaHQ Documentation.

heading: Enhancements for Task Output and Visualization

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Task Output Dropdown: Now, in the task output dropdown for REST API connections, you can view response headers alongside the output. This enhancement provides more comprehensive information for debugging and analysis.

Improved Individual Task Run Display: Individual task responses now include not only the output but also the response headers. This addition facilitates better debugging by providing more context and details.

JSON Tree Integration in Raw Output View: In the raw output view of individual task runs, a new tab has been introduced for JSON Tree visualization. This UI enhancement offers a more user-friendly way to visualize the raw request, response, and output, improving the overall user experience.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Database Reachability Analysis: Gain insights into your database's accessibility by providing the host URL or host port via the whitelisting IP toggle.
Case Insensitive Name Search: Bid farewell to case sensitivity! Searches for connector database names are now case insensitive, offering a smoother and more intuitive user experience.

Schema-independent Database Connection Testing: Testing connections to your database is now schema-independent, ensuring a diverse range of connection checks. This enhancement allows for a basic level validation of database permissions, providing comprehensive testing capabilities.

Optimized Schema listing: Enjoy a refined query building experience! The query builder now loads instantly, providing immediate access to crafting your queries. Additionally, the schema segment dynamically loads all available schemas, ensuring a hassle-free browsing experience even with a large number of schemas. Simply scroll through the schema window, and your schemas will continue to load effortlessly.
Support for AlloyDB via Postgres Connector: Seamlessly connect to AlloyDB using the Postgres connector, with added support for SSH tunneling.

heading: File Storage
descriptions: Discover seamless file management with our new service, powered by AWS S3. Use our intuitive explorer and dedicated connector for effortless file handling. Cloud users can find it in the DronaHQ Managed section. Don't miss out—activate your free trial for 1 GB storage today! Read more about it.

cards.title: Added
points: Automation - REST API : Discover effortless integration with external systems, web services, and APIs through our new Automation Block, REST API. Simplify data exchange, trigger actions, and seamlessly integrate with online platforms. Read more about it.
Automation - DronaHQ DB : Explore DronaHQ DB for robust data management in BPM Flows. Efficient storage, retrieval, and manipulation. Enhance workflow precision. Read more about it..

heading: DronaHQ Theme
descriptions: Start customizing themes effortlessly with our intuitive interface. Choose from default light/dark options or unleash creativity with custom themes.
Craft visual masterpieces that reflect your unique style and brand identity with ease.
Each application gets its own theme playground, allowing you to fine-tune the visual presentation to your heart's content.
Want to switch up the vibe on the fly? Our dynamic theme modification feature lets you do just that, even after your app is live. Say goodbye to static visuals and hello to endless flexibility!

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Connector Query – Tailored Queries : Take control of your data retrieval and manipulation with custom queries tailored to your exact specifications.

Connector Library – Reusable Queries : Save time and streamline your integration process by accessing pre-existing queries within the library. With a range of connectors and preadded queries at your fingertips, integration has never been easier.

heading: DronaHQ Managed DB
descriptions: Prepare for the revolution! Introducing DronaHQ DB, a marvel in managed PostgreSQL platforms. Imagine a world where managing data feels as intuitive as handling spreadsheets, within your very apps! It’s tailored for efficiency, empowered by SQL queries, and wrapped in a user-friendly interface, ensuring seamless data handling. Learn more about DronaHQ Database.

heading: Show Control Loader
descriptions: Enhance user interaction in micro-applications with the Show Control Loader action, enabling the integration of dynamic loading indicators and spinners. This feature ensures smoother navigation and active user engagement by providing real-time feedback during ongoing processes. Dive deeper into its technical capabilities here to optimize your application's user experience.

heading: Hide Screen Loader
descriptions: It effortlessly conceals loading indicators within micro-apps, ensuring a polished interface. With processes completed, watch these loading states gracefully fade away, elevating your application's sophistication. Explore its capabilities here.

heading: Data Query - REST API
descriptions: Embark on a journey of enhanced connectivity with the Rest API in Data Query , delving into a myriad of possibilities. Leveraging basic authentication, seamlessly interface with public APIs, accessing diverse data sets such as weather updates, dummy data, or IP-based information. Additionally, utilize the proxy toggle feature to adeptly manage CORS issues.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: App Builder and Landing Page Load Time : We’ve turbocharged your experience! The DronaHQ App Builder is now armed with caching algorithms, slashing network stress and backend API load. Say goodbye to lag and hello to lightning-fast load times!

Save API Optimization: Speed, precision, efficiency - amplified! Our enhancements to the app save API make building applications a breeze. Get ready for save times that scale with your app’s size, delivering a staggering 10% - 70% boost in efficiency.

cards.title: Enhancements
descriptions: Trace every step, celebrate every event! Our configurable audit logs are now at your fingertips, seamlessly accessible in databases or chosen audit logging tools. For a deeper dive, check out our Detailed article encompassing log formats, events, and more.

cards.title: Enhancements
descriptions: Empower your systems! Ensure IP reachability with our seamless functionality, fortifying your network’s security and accessibility.

heading: SurrealDB
descriptions: Welcome to the future of data handling! SurrealDB stands tall as a cutting-edge distributed NoSQL database system. It’s not just a database; it’s an ecosystem engineered for unparalleled scalability, high availability, and unwavering fault tolerance across diverse data workloads.
